templates.name: Total Requests
templates.desc: Total requests across all load balancers
templates.query: SELECT SUM(RequestCount) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/ApplicationELB", LoadBalancer)

templates.name: Active Connections Count
templates.desc: Top 10 most active load balancers
templates.query: SELECT MAX(ActiveConnectionCount) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/ApplicationELB", LoadBalancer) GROUP BY LoadBalancer ORDER BY SUM() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Top 10 Consumed Reads Tables
templates.desc: Top 10 tables by consumed reads
templates.query: SELECT SUM(ProvisionedWriteCapacityUnits) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/DynamoDB", TableName) GROUP BY TableName ORDER BY MAX() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Top 10 Returned Bytes Tables
templates.desc: Top 10 tables by returned bytes
templates.query: SELECT SUM(ReturnedBytes) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/DynamoDB", TableName)  GROUP BY TableName ORDER BY MAX() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Top 10 tables by user errors
templates.desc: Top 10 tables by user errors
templates.query: SELECT SUM(UserErrors) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/DynamoDB", TableName) GROUP BY TableName ORDER BY MAX() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Number of Invocations
templates.desc: Lambda functions ordered by number of invocations
templates.query: SELECT SUM(Invocations) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/Lambda",FunctionName) GROUP BY FunctionName ORDER BY SUM() DESC

templates.name: Top 10 Longest Runtime Func
templates.desc: Top 10 Lambda functions by longest runtime
templates.query: SELECT AVG(Duration) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/Lambda",FunctionName) GROUP BY FunctionName ORDER BY MAX() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Top 10 Error Count Func
templates.desc: Top 10 Lambda functions by error count
templates.query: SELECT SUM(Errors) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/Lambda", FunctionName) GROUP BY FunctionName ORDER BY SUM() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Top 20 AWS APIs
templates.desc: Top 20 AWS APIs by the number of calls in your account
templates.query: SELECT COUNT(CallCount) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/Usage", Class, Resource, Service, Type) WHERE Type = 'API' GROUP BY Service, Resource ORDER BY COUNT() DESC LIMIT 20

templates.name: CloudWatch APIs sorted by calls
templates.desc: CloudWatch APIs sorted by calls
templates.query: SELECT COUNT(CallCount) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/Usage", Class, Resource, Service, Type) WHERE Type = 'API' AND Service = 'CloudWatch' GROUP BY Resource ORDER BY COUNT() DESC

templates.name: Top 10 Amazon EBS volumes
templates.desc: Top 10 Amazon EBS volumes by bytes written
templates.query: SELECT SUM(VolumeWriteBytes) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/EBS", VolumeId) GROUP BY VolumeId ORDER BY SUM() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Average EBS write time
templates.desc: Average Amazon EBS volume write time
templates.query: SELECT AVG(VolumeTotalWriteTime) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/EBS", VolumeId)

templates.name: Top 10 Highest CPU util. instances
templates.desc: Top 10 instances by highest CPU utilization
templates.query: SELECT AVG(CPUUtilization) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/EC2", InstanceId) GROUP BY InstanceId ORDER BY AVG() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: CPU across entire fleet
templates.desc: Average CPU utilization across the entire fleet
templates.query: SELECT AVG(CPUUtilization) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/EC2", InstanceId)

templates.name: Highest utilization CPU instances
templates.desc: CPU utilization of EC2 instances sorted by highest
templates.query: SELECT AVG(CPUUtilization) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/EC2", InstanceId) GROUP BY InstanceId ORDER BY AVG() DESC

templates.name: Top 10 clusters by memory
templates.desc: Top 10 clusters by memory utilization
templates.query: SELECT AVG(MemoryUtilization) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/ECS", ClusterName) GROUP BY ClusterName ORDER BY AVG() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Top 10 clusters by cpu
templates.desc: Top 10 services by CPU utilization
templates.query: SELECT AVG(CPUUtilization) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/ECS", ClusterName, ServiceName) GROUP BY ClusterName, ServiceName ORDER BY AVG() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Top 10 services
templates.desc: Top 10 services by running tasks (Container Insights)
templates.query: SELECT AVG(RunningTaskCount) FROM SCHEMA("ECS/ContainerInsights", ClusterName, ServiceName) GROUP BY ClusterName, ServiceName ORDER BY AVG() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Avg. CPU util ECS Cluster
templates.desc: Average CPU utilization across all ECS clusters
templates.query: SELECT AVG(CPUUtilization) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/ECS", ClusterName)

templates.name: Average latency by bucket
templates.desc: Average latency by bucket
templates.query: SELECT AVG(TotalRequestLatency) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/S3", BucketName, FilterId) WHERE FilterId = 'EntireBucket' GROUP BY BucketName ORDER BY AVG() DESC

templates.name: Top 10 buckets
templates.desc: Top 10 buckets by bytes downloaded
templates.query: SELECT SUM(BytesDownloaded) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/S3", BucketName, FilterId) WHERE FilterId = 'EntireBucket' GROUP BY BucketName ORDER BY SUM() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Top 10 most active queues
templates.desc: Top 10 most active queues
templates.query: SELECT SUM(NumberOfMessagesSent) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/SQS", QueueName) GROUP BY QueueName ORDER BY SUM() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Top 10 queues by age
templates.desc: Top 10 queues by age of earliest message
templates.query: SELECT AVG(ApproximateAgeOfOldestMessage) FROM SCHEMA("AWS/SQS", QueueName) GROUP BY QueueName ORDER BY AVG() DESC LIMIT 10

templates.name: Lambda Workload Function
templates.desc: Lambda Metrics- Errors, Duration & Throttles
templates.query: [ "AWS/Lambda", "Errors", "FunctionName", "workload" ],[ ".", "Duration", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right", "stat": "Maximum" } ],[ ".", "Throttles", ".", "." ]
